channel.title: Orbital Blues - The Train Job 2 Thursdays in June
channel.description:
*This is the rock and roll future of yesteryear that never was—and nobody wanted.* *It is an intergalactic age of cowboys, outlaws and bandits playing on an interstellar stage.* *It is a time of hyper-capitalism and a cutthroat gig economy.* *Unreliable trash-heaps carry scrappy underdogs to their next gig,* *and corporation freighters lumber across the horizon laden with an empire’s bounty.* *The backstreets of every terraformed metropolis brim with a thousand lonely hearts* *and a thousand more venal vendettas.* *The burnt-out wastelands between bright lights are lawless bat countries* *—anachronistic Americana languishing beneath multiple moons.* *Madness lies in every direction at every solar hour.* *These are the music-fuelled, moon-age daydreams of a rebel space age.* This is session one of a two-shot of Orbital Blues where the players are hired to rob an Authority train. It will probably be fine. We will make characters and begin the job.As a system, Orbital Blues lands somewhere between story games and the OSR. Players will portray sad space cowboys who are down on their luck and in need of a job in a way the is reminiscent of Cowboy Bebop, Firefly, The Mandolorian, and maybe even a little Borderlands. It’s hard out here at the edges of the galaxy and things can get pretty lethal.I will send a reminder 1 week before the session. Rules will be taught. Being excited about sad music a plus, but not required. **CW:** Anxiety, Death, Depression, Gambling, Mental Illness and Associated Traumas, Poverty, Smoking, Substance Abuse, Violence **System** : Orbital Blues **Duration** : 3 Hours **Breaks** : 5-10 minutes approximately on the hour **Venue** : GM’s Zoom **Recording** : No **Safety** : Lines & Veils, X-card, and open door policy. Tools can be changed to suit the players. This game will follow the [Gauntlet Community Code of Conduct](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/community-code-of-conduct.html).
Session 1: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-N1aBQM5aoAz7Y_E12pq
Session 2: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-N1aBe9eVZORDWC8NPlo
